name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Experienced Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of proven expertise in delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python** and leveraging **AI** technologies, including LLMs and **generative AI**. Skilled in containerization and orchestration using **Docker**, with robust development practices including **CI/CD** and **Git** for streamlined code management.

Hands-on experience in deploying cloud-native infrastructure on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, with a strong focus on Infrastructure as Code (**IaC**) and optimizing systems through **caching**, **parallelism**, and **decoupling** for improved performance.

Demonstrated ability in **Prompt Engineering** and supporting **AI/ML** initiatives, along with a solid background in compliance-driven development across HIPAA and PCI DSS standards. Renowned for problem-solving capabilities, critical thinking, and effective communication in collaborative environments.
